content: this is a legal case that is currently ongoing in the county court of varaždin the case involves a dispute over the ownership of a property between two parties in the first instance the municipal court of samobor awarded each party ownership of half of the property the coownership of the property was dissolved through a civil partition and the property was sold at a public auction the proceeds from the sale will be distributed proportionally among the parties based on their coownership shares the court used legal principles from the property act to make this decision the defendant claims to have invested in the property after the end of their marriage and believes they should have a larger coownership share the court conducted an investigation and determined that the defendant had acquired a ¼ coownership share the defendant appealed the decision but the court upheld the initial judgment based on the applicable legal provisions
